metadata.title: CVE-2018-20723 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in color_templates.php inCacti before 1.2.0 due to lack of escaping of unintended characters in theName field for a Color.

criterions.comment: cacti: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
